creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
inscription: 大正十年一月 {Taishō jūnen ichigatsu} (January 1921)
markings: on back, red seal: 摺刷壱百枚限の内　第参拾九番 {shūsatsu ichihyaku mai kagiri no uchi, dai sanjūkyū ban} (the limited printing of 100, number 39); red seal: 江戸絵鑑賞会開板 {Edo-e kanshōkai kaiban} (published by Appreciating Edo Paintings Society)
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
text: A separate paper attached on the back explains how this print was produced as an annual project of the Appreciating Edo Paintings Society.
title: Ikenohata at Night
